article_list.body: A 12-member collective of noted U.K.-based musicians used “Bitches Brew” as a springboard, improvising a new LP after the pandemic thwarted a 50th anniversary celebration for the original.
article_list.title: 53 Years After Miles Davis’s Album, a Fresh Spin as ‘London Brew’
